channel.title: Steve on Semidigital Meta Adventures
channel.description: Recent content in Steve on Semidigital Meta Adventures

item.title: Steve
item.description: STEVE is brake steer rover. He is based on the Tamiya tracked chassis. The plan is to get the arduino to drive the H-bridges and then the main controler is going to be a TinyFPGA-BX. I have a number of sensors to attach, but first thing first.
